expectedText: Patient is a 45-year-old male presenting with intermittent dizziness for the past 2 weeks. Episodes last 30 seconds to 1 minute. Triggered by head movements. No hearing loss or tinnitus.
allowedVariations: Patient is a 45 year old male presenting with intermittent dizziness for the past two weeks.
45-year-old male with intermittent dizziness for 2 weeks.
notes: Standard HPI dictation for BPPV patient
